GLOBAL TERROR INCIDENTS

There are 3 visualizations presented here:

1. The world choropleth gives an overview of the total number of terror incidents that have occured throughout the world, beginning from 2011

2. The barchart picks up top 10 countries based on the number incidents from the map, beginning from 2011

3. The streamGraph represents the type of terror incidents that have occured across the selected country year wise

(Slide the scale to view year wise incidents on the map below)
